response_deadline: 3 business days (with explanation if longer needed)
notes: 3 business day response deadline with required explanation for delays. Attorney General enforces and provides guidance. Court penalties only for knowing/purposeful violations.

basic_request.subject: Missouri Sunshine Law Records Request
basic_request.body:
Dear Custodian of Records:

Pursuant to the Missouri Sunshine Law, Missouri Revised Statutes Chapter 610, I respectfully request access to inspect and copy the following public records:

[SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS]

Please respond to this request as soon as possible, but no later than the end of the third business day following receipt as required by ยง 610.023.3. If access cannot be granted immediately, please explain the reason for delay and provide the earliest date and time the records will be available.

If any portion of this request is denied, please provide written explanation citing the specific exemption under Chapter 610.

I prefer to receive responsive records electronically when possible to minimize costs. Please provide a fee estimate if copying charges will be substantial.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]

appeal_template.subject: Sunshine Law Complaint - Records Request Denial
appeal_template.body:
Dear Attorney General:

I am filing a complaint regarding a violation of the Missouri Sunshine Law. On [DATE], I submitted a records request to [AGENCY] for [DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS].

The agency [denied my request/failed to respond/charged excessive fees] in violation of Missouri Revised Statutes Chapter 610. Specifically, [DESCRIBE VIOLATION].

I believe this action violates the Sunshine Law because [LEGAL REASONING]. I request that your office investigate this matter and take appropriate enforcement action.

Attached are copies of my original request and the agency's response (if any).

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
